value.title: Implement Windows Server IaaS VM Identity
value.excerpt: After completing this learning path, you’ll know how to implement identity in Azure. You’ll be able to extend an existing on-premises Active Directory identity service into Azure.

topItems.title: Implement hybrid identity with Windows Server
topItems.excerpt: Implement hybrid identity with Windows Server

topItems.title: Deploy and manage Azure IaaS Active Directory domain controllers in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Deploy and manage Azure IaaS active directory domain controllers in Azure

value.title: Deploy and manage Azure IaaS Active Directory domain controllers in Azure
value.excerpt: Deploy and manage Azure IaaS active directory domain controllers in Azure

value.title: Azure fundamentals
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of Azure cloud computing.

topItems.title: Cloud Concepts - Principles of cloud computing
topItems.excerpt: Explore the core concepts and benefits of cloud computing as you learn how to choose a cloud deployment model customized for your organization.

topItems.title: Create an Azure account
topItems.excerpt: Find out how to start using Azure by creating an account where you’ll see services and personal settings for identity, billing, and preferences.

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Introduction to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Create your first virtual machine as you discover the power of Azure cloud computing and storage, along with services that help you explore new software paradigms.

topItems.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure architecture and service guarantees
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the Azure global network of physical datacenters, the physical architecture of Azure, how redundancy is provided, and Microsoft service guarantees.

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure compute options
value.excerpt: Explore essential Azure concepts to find out how virtual machines, containers, and apps combined with serverless computing services can fortify your business.

value.title: Administer infrastructure resources in Azure
value.excerpt: This learning path teaches how to create and customize Windows and Linux virtual machines, connect them to virtual networks, and keep them updated.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

topItems.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

topItems.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

topItems.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

value.title: AI edge engineer
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure IoT
topItems.excerpt: University of Oxford

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Hub
topItems.excerpt: University of Oxford

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure IoT Edge
topItems.excerpt: University of Oxford

topItems.title: Deploy a pre-built module to the Edge device
topItems.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Architect compute infrastructure in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to architect compute infrastructure and solutions to automate your business processes in Azure.

topItems.title: Explore Azure compute services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the different services that are available in Azure Compute.

topItems.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

topItems.title: Choose a compute provisioning solution for your application
topItems.excerpt: Discover the services and tools available to automate the deployment and configuration of your Azure infrastructure.

topItems.title: Build Azure Resource Manager templates
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Resource Manager templates express your deployments as code, enabling you to deploy faster and more reliably.

value.title: Architect message brokering and serverless applications in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to create reliable messaging for your applications, and how to take advantage of serverless application services in Azure.

topItems.title: Create serverless logic with Azure Functions
topItems.excerpt: Azure Functions allow you to host business logic that can be executed without managing or provisioning server infrastructure

topItems.title: Route and process data automatically using Logic Apps
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to define a workflow to run your business with Logic apps using built-in triggers, actions, and conditional operators.

topItems.title: Choose a messaging model in Azure to loosely connect your services
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure's storage queues, event hubs, event grid, and service bus can improve your communication between devices.

topItems.title: Communicate between applications with Azure Queue storage
topItems.excerpt: Find out to use Azure Queue storage to handle high demand and improve resilience in your distributed applications.

value.title: Architect migration, business continuity, and disaster recovery in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to migrate resources to Azure, how to provide site recovery for your applications in Azure and on-premises, and how to your applications are available through service interruptions and changes in load.

topItems.title: Design your migration to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Migrate and Azure Database Migration Service.

topItems.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your on-premises infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of VMware virtual machines, Hyper-V virtual machines, and physical servers with Azure Site Recovery.

topItems.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

topItems.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.

value.title: Architect modern applications in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to build modern applications using PaaS services for applications, caching, containers and Kubernetes in Azure.

topItems.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

topItems.title: Run Docker containers with Azure Container Instances
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to run and troubleshoot containerized apps using Docker containers with Azure Container Instances.

topItems.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

topItems.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
topItems.excerpt: Create a website in the programming language of your choice through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

value.title: Architect secure infrastructure in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn about the tools and services available on Azure to ensure your resources are secure.

topItems.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you’ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
topItems.excerpt: Explore the options for Azure disk encryption to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new virtual machines.

topItems.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Key Vault to store secret values and how to enable secure access to the vault.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure’s role-based access control to effectively manage your team’s access to Azure resources.

value.title: AZ-104: Configure and manage virtual networks for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure key Azure network capabilities and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to connect your local on-premises networks into Azure using virtual networks, VPN gateways, and Azure ExpressRoute.

topItems.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to plan and implement an IP addressing scheme for virtual networks and virtual machines in Azure.

topItems.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
topItems.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

topItems.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
topItems.excerpt: Find out how Azure network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

value.title: AZ-104: Deploy and manage Azure compute resources
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy and configure Azure compute resources and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

topItems.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

topItems.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

topItems.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.

value.title: AZ-104: Implement and manage storage in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to manage storage in Azure and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Create an Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Discover ways to use an Azure Storage account to manage your data for billing, access, and storage location of your blobs, files, queues, and tables.

topItems.title: Choose the right disk storage for your virtual machine workload
topItems.excerpt: Azure provides a variety of disk storage options for virtual machine workloads. Identify the features of capabilities of each type to ensure your application performs optimally.

topItems.title: Provide disaster recovery by replicating storage data across regions and failing over to secondary location
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to provide disaster recovery by replicating storage data across regions and failing over to secondary location.

topItems.title: Secure your Azure Storage account
topItems.excerpt: Learn how Azure Storage provides multilayered security to protect your data with access keys, secure networks, and Advanced Threat Protection monitoring.

value.title: AZ-104: Monitor and back up Azure resources
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor and back up Azure resources and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

topItems.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to monitor the health of your Azure VMs by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts.

topItems.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

topItems.title: Monitor performance of virtual machines by using Azure Monitor for VMs
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Monitor for VMs to monitor your organization's Azure virtual machines.

value.title: AZ-104: Prerequisites for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn the basic concepts you'll need to know as an Azure administrator and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Build a cloud governance strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to access policies, resource locks, and tags, as well as how Azure services such as Azure Policy and Azure Blueprints can help you build a comprehensive cloud governance strategy.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

topItems.title: Fundamentals of computer networking
topItems.excerpt: You'll learn the fundamental principles of computer networking to prepare you for the Azure admin and developer learning paths.

topItems.title: Fundamentals of network security
topItems.excerpt: Explore the fundamentals of computer networking security and monitoring.

value.title: AZ-400: Define and implement continuous integration
value.excerpt: Create automated pipelines that continuously build, test, and deploy your applications and prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

topItems.title: Run quality tests in your build pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Find out about automated testing that proves your code to be maintainable, understandable, and functioning without repetitive manual testing.

topItems.title: Manage build dependencies with Azure Artifacts
topItems.excerpt: In this module, the Space Game web team guides you through creating a build pipeline that produces a package that can be used by multiple applications.

topItems.title: Host your own build agent in Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Work with guidance from the Space Game web team to set up your build agent running on-premises or on an Azure virtual machine running in the cloud.

value.title: AZ-400: Develop a Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) strategy
value.excerpt: Sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products and prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
topItems.excerpt: Learn about SRE, an engineering discipline that helps you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

topItems.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging
topItems.excerpt: Learn about how to capture trace output from your Azure web apps. View a live log stream and download logs files for offline analysis.

topItems.title: Manage site reliability
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

value.title: AZ-400: Develop an instrumentation strategy
value.excerpt: Develop an effective instrumentation strategy through logging, telemetry, and monitoring and prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging
topItems.excerpt: Learn about how to capture trace output from your Azure web apps. View a live log stream and download logs files for offline analysis.

topItems.title: Control and organize Azure resources with Azure Resource Manager
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Resource Manager to organize resources, enforce standards, and protect critical assets from deletion.

topItems.title: Introduction to App Center
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure App services to find ways to simplify creation and integration as you build, distribute, test, and analyze usage of yours apps.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 2: Describe core Azure services
value.excerpt: This learning path provides you with an introduction to the basics of Azure's core services for compute, network, storage, and database.

topItems.title: Explore Azure compute services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the different services that are available in Azure Compute.

topItems.title: Explore Azure networking services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the core networking resources that are available in Azure, such as Virtual Networks, VPN Gateway, and ExpressRoute.

topItems.title: Explore Azure Storage services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the different storage options that are available in Azure Storage.

topItems.title: Explore Azure database and analytics services
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the database services that are available on Microsoft Azure, such as Azure Cosmos DB, Azure SQL, Azure Database for MySQL, Azure Database for PostgreSQL, as well as big data and analytics.

value.title: Azure Fundamentals part 3: Describe core solutions and management tools on Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to choose the best services from Azure to build and manage cloud solutions.

topItems.title: Choose the best Azure IoT service for your application
topItems.excerpt: Examine Azure IoT services, and choose the right service for your scenario.

topItems.title: Choose the best AI service for your needs
topItems.excerpt: Examine Azure's AI services, and choose the right one for your company.

topItems.title: Choose the best Azure serverless technology for your compute scenario
topItems.excerpt: Examine Azure's serverless technologies and choose the right service for your scenario.

topItems.title: Choose the best tools to help organizations build better solutions
topItems.excerpt: Learn about Microsoft tools and services that help developers and operations engineers build modern solutions for the cloud and on-premises.

value.title: Azure Static Web Apps
value.excerpt: Azure Static Web Apps is a modern web app service that offers streamlined full-stack development from source code to global high availability.

topItems.title: Publish an Angular, React, Svelte, or Vue JavaScript app with Azure Static Web Apps
topItems.excerpt: Publish an Angular, React, Svelte, or Vue JavaScript app with Azure Static Web Apps. Use Visual Studio Code to create and run the web app locally.

topItems.title: Publish an API to Azure Static Web Apps
topItems.excerpt: Publish an Angular, React, Svelte, or Vue JavaScript app and API with Azure Static Web Apps and Azure Functions. Deploy your code from GitHub to a staging site using preview URLs.

topItems.title: Authenticate users with Azure Static Web Apps
topItems.excerpt: Publish an Angular, React, Svelte, or Vue JavaScript app with API and authentication using Azure Static Web Apps and Azure Functions. Deploy your code from GitHub to a staging site using preview URLs.

topItems.title: Publish a Blazor WebAssembly app and .NET API with Azure Static Web Apps
topItems.excerpt: Publish a Blazor WebAssembly app and .NET API with Azure Static Web Apps

value.title: Build great solutions with the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how to design and build secure, scalable, high-performing solutions in Azure using the pillars of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
topItems.excerpt: Learn how using key principles throughout your cloud architecture can help you design and build a solid architectural foundation that you can continuously improve.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to adjust your capacity based on workload and how to optimize network performance, storage, and database performance.

value.title: Configure and manage virtual networks for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure and manage key Azure network capabilities.

topItems.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to connect your local on-premises networks into Azure using virtual networks, VPN gateways, and Azure ExpressRoute.

topItems.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you will learn how to plan and implement an IP addressing scheme for virtual networks and virtual machines in Azure.

topItems.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
topItems.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

topItems.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
topItems.excerpt: Find out how Azure network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

value.title: Create data-driven websites by using Django
value.excerpt: Use Django to create data-driven websites.

topItems.title: Get started with Django
topItems.excerpt: Django is one of the most popular Python web frameworks. Explore its benefits, learn how to install it, and create your first project.

topItems.title: Work with models and data in Django
topItems.excerpt: Explore models and data in Django. Learn about the object-relational mapper, create your own models, and set up a database.

topItems.title: Work with the Django admin site
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to set up the built-in Django admin site and configure users for the site.

topItems.title: Create views and templates in Django
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the templating engine in Django to create dynamic HTML. In this module, you'll create views and use template variables, inheritance, and tags.

value.title: Create serverless applications
value.excerpt: In this learning path, discover Azure Functions that create event-driven, compute-on-demand systems using server-side logic to build serverless architectures.

topItems.title: Choose the best Azure service to automate your business processes
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll discuss how to choose the appropriate Azure service to integrate and automate business processes.

topItems.title: Create serverless logic with Azure Functions
topItems.excerpt: Azure Functions allow you to host business logic that can be executed without managing or provisioning server infrastructure

topItems.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
topItems.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.

topItems.title: Chain Azure Functions together using input and output bindings
topItems.excerpt: In this module, we'll learn how to integrate your Azure Function with various data sources by using bindings.

value.title: Deploy a website to Azure with Azure App Service
value.excerpt: In this learning path, get acquainted with using Azure App Service to create and deploy your website without underlying servers, storage or network assets.

topItems.title: Prepare your development environment for Azure development
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to choose and install the appropriate IDE for your requirements to help you build, deploy, monitor, and scale cloud-hosted solutions.

topItems.title: Host a web application with Azure App service
topItems.excerpt: Create a website in the programming language of your choice through the hosted web app platform in Azure App Service.

topItems.title: Publish a web app to Azure with Visual Studio
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure App Service to create a new ASP.NET-based web app, then publish and update directly from Visual Studio.

topItems.title: Stage a web app deployment for testing and rollback by using App Service deployment slots
topItems.excerpt: Discover the benefits of creating deployment slots to streamline deployment and roll back a web app in Azure App Service.

value.title: Deploy a website with Azure virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn to use a Windows or Linux Azure Virtual Machine to extend the website support that Azure provides.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

topItems.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

topItems.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

topItems.title: Build and run a web application with the MEAN stack on an Azure Linux virtual machine
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to decide if the MEAN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, AngularJS, and Node.js) is a good choice for you and set up a MEAN-based web application on a new Azure Linux virtual machine.

value.title: Deploy and configure Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machine
value.excerpt: In this learning path, you’ll learn how to deploy and configure Azure IaaS Virtual Machine workloads. After completing the learning path, you’ll know how to plan, deploy, and upgrade Windows Server Azure Virtual Machines.

topItems.title: Plan and deploy Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machines
topItems.excerpt: You'll be able to describe Azure compute and storage in relation to Azure VMs, and deploy Azure VMs by using the Azure portal, Azure CLI, or templates.

topItems.title: Customize Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machine images
topItems.excerpt: You'll be able to create new VMs from generalized images and use Azure Image Builder templates to create and manage images in Azure.

topItems.title: Automate the configuration of Windows Server IaaS Virtual Machines
topItems.excerpt: You'll be able to deploy Desired State Configuration (DSC) extensions, implement those extensions to remediate noncompliant servers, and use custom script extension.

topItems.title: Upgrade and migrate Windows Server IaaS virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn to migrate a workload running in Windows Server to an infrastructure as a service (IaaS) virtual machine (VM) and to Windows Server 2019 by using Windows Server migration tools or the Storage Migration Service.

value.title: Deploy and manage compute resources for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to deploy and configure Azure compute resources and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Create a Linux virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: This module guides you through options for virtual machines in Azure, creating and connecting a Linux virtual machine, and configuring your network settings.

topItems.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

topItems.title: Manage virtual machines with the Azure CLI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cross-platform Azure CLI to create, start, stop, and perform other management tasks related to virtual machines in Azure.

topItems.title: Add and size disks in Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about your virtual machine storage options and how to choose between standard and premium, managed and unmanaged disks for your Azure virtual machine.
